column2: Make Constantinople Center of Episcopal Authority
For too long, the Pope in Rome, the patriarch of Rome has claimed to have primacy, now that we control Rome, we should fix this misconception
Put Sicily Under the Patriarch of Constantinople
With Sicily fully under our control, it is time that we resolve the issue of what Episcopal See this area belongs too
Put Sicily Under the Episcopal Authority of the Pope
Earlier, the Byzantines had forced Sicily to be under the Episcopal Authority of the Byzantine Patriarch, however now that they no longer control the region, it is time we fix this historic mistake
